Create a basic version of a merge-style game inspired by the Watermelon Game, with the following core mechanics:

Game Area:

A confined "bucket" space where the game takes place
Simple 2D graphics, can use basic shapes initially

Core Gameplay:

Players drop pieces into the bucket
Like pieces merge when they touch, creating larger pieces
Goal is to reach a target score before the bucket overflows
If a piece falls out of the bucket, the game ends

Piece Mechanics:

Start with 3-4 different piece types (e.g., small, medium, large, extra-large)
Each piece has a point value
Implement basic physics for piece movement and collisions

Scoring:

Merging pieces increases the score
Display current score and target score


User Interface:

Show the bucket and falling pieces
Display score and target score
Simple "Game Over" screen when a piece falls out


Basic Controls:

Use arrow keys or mouse to position falling pieces
Spacebar to drop pieces faster

Round Progression:

If target score is reached, move to next round
Increase difficulty slightly each round (e.g., higher target score, faster piece drops)

Focus on creating a functional prototype with these core elements. Use simple graphics and placeholder sounds initially. The game should run smoothly and be playable from start to game over.

    2. Modify the resolveCollision function to reduce the transfer of momentum:
       ```javascript
       function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
           const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
           const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
           const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
           const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

           if (overlap > 0) {
               const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
               const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
               const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

               piece1.x -= moveX;
               piece1.y -= moveY;
               piece2.x += moveX;
               piece2.y += moveY;

               const normalX = dx / distance;
               const normalY = dy / distance;
               const tangentX = -normalY;
               const tangentY = normalX;

               const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
               const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

               const v1n = dot1;
               const v2n = dot2;
               const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
               const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

               const massRatio1 = piece1.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);
               const massRatio2 = piece2.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);

               piece1.vx = (tangentX * v1t + normalX * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
               piece1.vy = (tangentY * v1t + normalY * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
               piece2.vx = (tangentX * v2t + normalX * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;
               piece2.vy = (tangentY * v2t + normalY * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;
           }
       }
       ```

       ```javascript
       function update(deltaTime) {
           for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
               const piece = pieces[i];

               piece.vx *= FRICTION;
               piece.vy *= FRICTION;

               // Apply minimum velocity threshold
               const minVelocity = 1;
               if (Math.abs(piece.vx) < minVelocity) piece.vx = 0;
       ```

       ```javascript
       const GRAVITY = 1200; // Increased from 800
       const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.2; // Decreased from 0.3
       const FRICTION = 0.95; // Increased from 0.98
       ```

    2. Modify the resolveCollision function to reduce the transfer of momentum:
       ```javascript
       function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
           const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
           const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
           const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
           const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

           if (overlap > 0) {
               const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
               const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
               const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

               piece1.x -= moveX;
               piece1.y -= moveY;
               piece2.x += moveX;
               piece2.y += moveY;

               const normalX = dx / distance;
               const normalY = dy / distance;
               const tangentX = -normalY;
               const tangentY = normalX;

               const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
               const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

               const v1n = dot1;
               const v2n = dot2;
               const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
               const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

               const massRatio1 = piece1.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);
               const massRatio2 = piece2.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);

               piece1.vx = (tangentX * v1t + normalX * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
               piece1.vy = (tangentY * v1t + normalY * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
               piece2.vx = (tangentX * v2t + normalX * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;
               piece2.vy = (tangentY * v2t + normalY * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;
           }
       }
       ```

    3. Update the update function to apply a minimum velocity threshold:
       ```javascript
       function update(deltaTime) {
       ```

To implement the requested changes, we need to modify the game.js file significantly. We'll start by updating the game mechanics to include the Angry Birds-style aiming system, improve collision detection and stacking, update the game loop and physics, and adjust the user interface. Let's begin by modifying the game.js file:
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/game.js">
// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 600; // pixels per second squared
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.7;

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;
let aimingStart, aimingEnd, isAiming = false;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', handleMouseDown);
    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y - piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw aiming line
    if (isAiming && currentPiece) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(aimingStart.x, aimingStart.y);
        ctx.lineTo(aimingEnd.x, aimingEnd.y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();

        // Draw trajectory preview
        drawTrajectoryPreview();
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece && !isAiming) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw slingshot
    drawSlingshot();
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw slingshot
function drawSlingshot() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 20, CANVAS_HEIGHT);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, CANVAS_HEIGHT - 50);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 20, CANVAS_HEIGHT);
    ctx.strokeStyle = '#8B4513';
    ctx.lineWidth = 5;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Draw trajectory preview
function drawTrajectoryPreview() {
    const steps = 20;
    const dt = 0.1;
    let x = aimingStart.x;
    let y = aimingStart.y;
    let vx = (aimingStart.x - aimingEnd.x) * 5;
    let vy = (aimingStart.y - aimingEnd.y) * 5;

    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(x, y);

    for (let i = 0; i < steps; i++) {
        x += vx * dt;
        y += vy * dt;
        vy += GRAVITY * dt;

        if (x < 0 || x > CANVAS_WIDTH || y > CANVAS_HEIGHT) break;

        ctx.lineTo(x, y);
    }

    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 1;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)]; // Start with only the first 3 types
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: CANVAS_HEIGHT - 50,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        piece1.x -= moveX;
        piece1.y -= moveY;
        piece2.x += moveX;
        piece2.y += moveY;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse down
function handleMouseDown(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingStart = {
            x: currentPiece.x,
            y: currentPiece.y
        };
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
        isAiming = true;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    if (isAiming) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
    }
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp() {
    if (isAiming && currentPiece) {
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (aimingStart.x - aimingEnd.x) * power;
        currentPiece.vy = (aimingStart.y - aimingEnd.y) * power;
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
        isAiming = false;
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();

To implement the requested changes, we need to modify the game.js file. We'll update the starting position of the pieces, adjust the aiming mechanic, and remove the slingshot visual element. Let's start by updating the game.js file:
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/game.js">
// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 600; // pixels per second squared
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.7;
const SPAWN_Y = 50; // Y position for spawning pieces

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;
let aimingStart, aimingEnd, isAiming = false;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', handleMouseDown);
    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y - piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw aiming line
    if (isAiming && currentPiece) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(aimingStart.x, aimingStart.y);
        ctx.lineTo(aimingEnd.x, aimingEnd.y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();

        // Draw trajectory preview
        drawTrajectoryPreview();
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece && !isAiming) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw spawn indicator
    drawSpawnIndicator();
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw spawn indicator
function drawSpawnIndicator() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, SPAWN_Y);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Draw trajectory preview
function drawTrajectoryPreview() {
    const steps = 20;
    const dt = 0.1;
    let x = aimingStart.x;
    let y = aimingStart.y;
    let vx = (aimingStart.x - aimingEnd.x) * 5;
    let vy = (aimingStart.y - aimingEnd.y) * 5;

    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(x, y);

    for (let i = 0; i < steps; i++) {
        x += vx * dt;
        y += vy * dt;
        vy += GRAVITY * dt;

        if (x < 0 || x > CANVAS_WIDTH || y > CANVAS_HEIGHT) break;

        ctx.lineTo(x, y);
    }

    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 1;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)]; // Start with only the first 3 types
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: SPAWN_Y,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        piece1.x -= moveX;
        piece1.y -= moveY;
        piece2.x += moveX;
        piece2.y += moveY;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse down
function handleMouseDown(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingStart = {
            x: currentPiece.x,
            y: currentPiece.y
        };
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
        isAiming = true;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    if (isAiming) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
    }
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp() {
    if (isAiming && currentPiece) {
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (aimingStart.x - aimingEnd.x) * power;
        currentPiece.vy = (aimingStart.y - aimingEnd.y) * power;
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
        isAiming = false;
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();
</code_agent_write_file>

        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse down
function handleMouseDown(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingStart = {
            x: currentPiece.x,
            y: currentPiece.y
        };
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
        isAiming = true;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    if (isAiming) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        aimingEnd = {
            x: e.clientX - rect.left,
            y: e.clientY - rect.top
        };
    }
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp() {
    if (isAiming && currentPiece) {
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (aimingStart.x - aimingEnd.x) * power;
        currentPiece.vy = (aimingStart.y - aimingEnd.y) * power;
        currentPiece.x = Math.max(currentPiece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - currentPiece.radius, currentPiece.x));
        currentPiece.y = Math.max(currentPiece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius, currentPiece.y));
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
        isAiming = false;
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();

// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 800; // Increased from 600
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.3; // Decreased from 0.7
const FRICTION = 0.98; // New constant for friction
const SPAWN_Y = 50; // Y position for spawning pieces

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.vx *= FRICTION; // Apply friction to horizontal velocity
        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y + piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw spawn indicator
    drawSpawnIndicator();
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw spawn indicator
function drawSpawnIndicator() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, SPAWN_Y);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)]; // Start with only the first 3 types
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: SPAWN_Y + pieceType.radius,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        piece1.x -= moveX;
        piece1.y -= moveY;
        piece2.x += moveX;
        piece2.y += moveY;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
        const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
        
        // Ensure the piece stays above the cursor
        currentPiece.x = mouseX;
        currentPiece.y = Math.min(mouseY - currentPiece.radius, SPAWN_Y);
    }
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
        const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
        
        const dx = mouseX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = mouseY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        currentPiece.vy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/game.js">
// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 800;
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.3;
const FRICTION = 0.98;
const SPAWN_Y = 50;

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;
let aimX, aimY;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.vx *= FRICTION;
        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y + piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw trajectory lines
    drawTrajectoryLines();

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw spawn indicator
    drawSpawnIndicator();
}

// Draw trajectory lines
function drawTrajectoryLines() {
    if (currentPiece) {
        // Draw solid line for initial fall
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(currentPiece.x, currentPiece.y);
        ctx.lineTo(currentPiece.x, CANVAS_HEIGHT);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();

        // Draw dotted line for predicted trajectory
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(currentPiece.x, currentPiece.y);
        let simX = currentPiece.x;
        let simY = currentPiece.y;
        let simVx = (aimX - currentPiece.x) / 10;
        let simVy = (aimY - currentPiece.y) / 10;
        ctx.setLineDash([8, 4]);
        for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
            simVy += GRAVITY * 0.016; // Simulate gravity
            simX += simVx * 0.016;
            simY += simVy * 0.016;
            if (simY > CANVAS_HEIGHT) break;
            ctx.lineTo(simX, simY);
        }
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.setLineDash([]);
    }
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw spawn indicator
function drawSpawnIndicator() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, SPAWN_Y);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: SPAWN_Y + pieceType.radius,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        piece1.x -= moveX;
        piece1.y -= moveY;
        piece2.x += moveX;
        piece2.y += moveY;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    aimX = e.clientX - rect.left;
    aimY = e.clientY - rect.top;
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const dx = aimX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = aimY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        currentPiece.vy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();
</code_agent_write_file>

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/game.js">
// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 800;
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.3;
const FRICTION = 0.98;
const SPAWN_Y = 50;

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;
let aimX, aimY;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.vx *= FRICTION;
        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y + piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw trajectory lines
    drawTrajectoryLines();

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw spawn indicator
    drawSpawnIndicator();
}

// Draw trajectory lines
function drawTrajectoryLines() {
    if (currentPiece) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(currentPiece.x, currentPiece.y);
        let simX = currentPiece.x;
        let simY = currentPiece.y;
        const dx = aimX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = aimY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        const power = 5;
        let simVx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        let simVy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        ctx.setLineDash([8, 4]);
        for (let i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
            simVy += GRAVITY * 0.016;
            simVx *= FRICTION;
            simX += simVx * 0.016;
            simY += simVy * 0.016;
            if (simY > CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius) {
                simY = CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius;
                simVy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            }
            if (simX < currentPiece.radius || simX > CANVAS_WIDTH - currentPiece.radius) {
                simX = Math.max(currentPiece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - currentPiece.radius, simX));
                simVx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            }
            ctx.lineTo(simX, simY);
            if (simY >= CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius && Math.abs(simVy) < 1) break;
        }
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.setLineDash([]);
    }
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw spawn indicator
function drawSpawnIndicator() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, SPAWN_Y);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: SPAWN_Y + pieceType.radius,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        piece1.x -= moveX;
        piece1.y -= moveY;
        piece2.x += moveX;
        piece2.y += moveY;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        piece1.vx = tangentX * v1t + normalX * v2n;
        piece1.vy = tangentY * v1t + normalY * v2n;
        piece2.vx = tangentX * v2t + normalX * v1n;
        piece2.vy = tangentY * v2t + normalY * v1n;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    aimX = e.clientX - rect.left;
    aimY = e.clientY - rect.top;
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const dx = aimX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = aimY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        currentPiece.vy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();
</code_agent_write_file>

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/game.js">
// Game constants
const CANVAS_WIDTH = 400;
const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
const PIECE_TYPES = [
    { radius: 20, color: '#FF0000', value: 1 },
    { radius: 30, color: '#00FF00', value: 2 },
    { radius: 40, color: '#0000FF', value: 4 },
    { radius: 50, color: '#FFFF00', value: 8 },
    { radius: 60, color: '#FF00FF', value: 16 },
    { radius: 70, color: '#00FFFF', value: 32 },
];
const GRAVITY = 1200;
const BOUNCE_FACTOR = 0.2;
const FRICTION = 0.98; // Increased from 0.95 to allow more movement
const SPAWN_Y = 50;

// Game variables
let canvas, ctx, pieces, currentPiece, score, round, gameOver, targetScore;
let lastTime, animationId;
let aimX, aimY;

// Audio
const mergeSound = new Audio('/static/audio/merge.mp3');
const launchSound = new Audio('/static/audio/drop.mp3');
const gameOverSound = new Audio('/static/audio/gameover.mp3');

// Initialize the game
function init() {
    canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width = CANVAS_WIDTH;
    canvas.height = CANVAS_HEIGHT;

    pieces = [];
    score = 0;
    round = 1;
    gameOver = false;
    targetScore = 100;

    updateScore();
    updateRound();

    canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', handleMouseUp);

    spawnPiece();
    lastTime = performance.now();
    gameLoop();
}

// Main game loop
function gameLoop(currentTime) {
    const deltaTime = (currentTime - lastTime) / 1000;
    lastTime = currentTime;

    update(deltaTime);
    render();

    if (!gameOver) {
        animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
    }
}

// Update game state
function update(deltaTime) {
    for (let i = 0; i < pieces.length; i++) {
        const piece = pieces[i];
        piece.vy += GRAVITY * deltaTime;
        piece.vx *= FRICTION;
        piece.vy *= FRICTION;

        // Apply minimum velocity threshold
        const minVelocity = 5; // Increased from 1
        if (Math.abs(piece.vx) < minVelocity) piece.vx = 0;
        if (Math.abs(piece.vy) < minVelocity) piece.vy = 0;

        piece.x += piece.vx * deltaTime;
        piece.y += piece.vy * deltaTime;

        // Bounce off walls
        if (piece.x - piece.radius < 0 || piece.x + piece.radius > CANVAS_WIDTH) {
            piece.vx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.x = Math.max(piece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - piece.radius, piece.x));
        }

        // Bounce off floor
        if (piece.y + piece.radius > CANVAS_HEIGHT) {
            piece.vy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            piece.y = CANVAS_HEIGHT - piece.radius;
        }

        // Check collision with other pieces
        for (let j = i + 1; j < pieces.length; j++) {
            const otherPiece = pieces[j];
            if (isColliding(piece, otherPiece)) {
                resolveCollision(piece, otherPiece);
                checkMerge(piece, otherPiece);
            }
        }
    }

    // Remove merged pieces
    pieces = pieces.filter(piece => !piece.merged);

    // Check for game over condition
    if (pieces.some(piece => piece.y + piece.radius <= 0)) {
        endGame();
    }

    // Check for round completion
    if (score >= targetScore) {
        nextRound();
    }
}

// Render the game
function render() {
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT);

    // Draw trajectory lines
    drawTrajectoryLines();

    // Draw pieces
    for (const piece of pieces) {
        drawPiece(piece);
    }

    // Draw current piece
    if (currentPiece) {
        drawPiece(currentPiece);
    }

    // Draw spawn indicator
    drawSpawnIndicator();
}

// Draw trajectory lines
function drawTrajectoryLines() {
    if (currentPiece) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(currentPiece.x, currentPiece.y);
        let simX = currentPiece.x;
        let simY = currentPiece.y;
        const dx = aimX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = aimY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        const power = 5;
        let simVx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        let simVy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        ctx.setLineDash([8, 4]);
        for (let i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
            simVy += GRAVITY * 0.016;
            simVx *= FRICTION;
            simX += simVx * 0.016;
            simY += simVy * 0.016;
            if (simY > CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius) {
                simY = CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius;
                simVy *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            }
            if (simX < currentPiece.radius || simX > CANVAS_WIDTH - currentPiece.radius) {
                simX = Math.max(currentPiece.radius, Math.min(CANVAS_WIDTH - currentPiece.radius, simX));
                simVx *= -BOUNCE_FACTOR;
            }
            ctx.lineTo(simX, simY);
            if (simY >= CANVAS_HEIGHT - currentPiece.radius && Math.abs(simVy) < 1) break;
        }
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)';
        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.setLineDash([]);
    }
}

// Draw a single piece
function drawPiece(piece) {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(piece.x, piece.y, piece.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = piece.color;
    ctx.fill();
    ctx.closePath();

    ctx.fillStyle = '#000';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.textBaseline = 'middle';
    ctx.fillText(piece.value, piece.x, piece.y);
}

// Draw spawn indicator
function drawSpawnIndicator() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, SPAWN_Y);
    ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 + 15, SPAWN_Y - 15);
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Spawn a new piece
function spawnPiece() {
    const pieceType = PIECE_TYPES[Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
    currentPiece = {
        x: CANVAS_WIDTH / 2,
        y: SPAWN_Y + pieceType.radius,
        vx: 0,
        vy: 0,
        ...pieceType
    };
}

// Check for merges
function checkMerge(piece1, piece2) {
    if (piece1.value === piece2.value) {
        const newPieceType = PIECE_TYPES[PIECE_TYPES.indexOf(PIECE_TYPES.find(t => t.value === piece1.value)) + 1];
        if (newPieceType) {
            const newPiece = {
                x: (piece1.x + piece2.x) / 2,
                y: (piece1.y + piece2.y) / 2,
                vx: (piece1.vx + piece2.vx) / 2,
                vy: (piece1.vy + piece2.vy) / 2,
                ...newPieceType
            };
            pieces.push(newPiece);
            piece1.merged = true;
            piece2.merged = true;
            score += newPieceType.value;
            updateScore();
            mergeSound.play();
        }
    }
}

// Check collision between two pieces
function isColliding(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece1.x - piece2.x;
    const dy = piece1.y - piece2.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    return distance < piece1.radius + piece2.radius;
}

// Resolve collision between two pieces
function resolveCollision(piece1, piece2) {
    const dx = piece2.x - piece1.x;
    const dy = piece2.y - piece1.y;
    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
    const overlap = (piece1.radius + piece2.radius) - distance;

    if (overlap > 0) {
        const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx);
        const moveX = overlap * Math.cos(angle) / 2;
        const moveY = overlap * Math.sin(angle) / 2;

        // Increase separation factor
        const separationFactor = 1.01;
        piece1.x -= moveX * separationFactor;
        piece1.y -= moveY * separationFactor;
        piece2.x += moveX * separationFactor;
        piece2.y += moveY * separationFactor;

        const normalX = dx / distance;
        const normalY = dy / distance;
        const tangentX = -normalY;
        const tangentY = normalX;

        const dot1 = piece1.vx * normalX + piece1.vy * normalY;
        const dot2 = piece2.vx * normalX + piece2.vy * normalY;

        const v1n = dot1;
        const v2n = dot2;
        const v1t = piece1.vx * tangentX + piece1.vy * tangentY;
        const v2t = piece2.vx * tangentX + piece2.vy * tangentY;

        const massRatio1 = piece1.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);
        const massRatio2 = piece2.radius / (piece1.radius + piece2.radius);

        piece1.vx = (tangentX * v1t + normalX * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
        piece1.vy = (tangentY * v1t + normalY * (v1n * (massRatio1 - massRatio2) + 2 * massRatio2 * v2n)) * 0.8;
        piece2.vx = (tangentX * v2t + normalX * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;
        piece2.vy = (tangentY * v2t + normalY * (v2n * (massRatio2 - massRatio1) + 2 * massRatio1 * v1n)) * 0.8;

        // Increase post-collision velocity to reduce sticking
        const velocityFactor = 1.05;
        piece1.vx *= velocityFactor;
        piece1.vy *= velocityFactor;
        piece2.vx *= velocityFactor;
        piece2.vy *= velocityFactor;
    }
}

// Handle mouse move
function handleMouseMove(e) {
    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    aimX = e.clientX - rect.left;
    aimY = e.clientY - rect.top;
}

// Handle mouse up
function handleMouseUp(e) {
    if (currentPiece) {
        const dx = aimX - currentPiece.x;
        const dy = aimY - currentPiece.y;
        const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        
        const power = 5;
        currentPiece.vx = (dx / distance) * power * 100;
        currentPiece.vy = (dy / distance) * power * 100;
        
        pieces.push(currentPiece);
        launchSound.play();
        spawnPiece();
    }
}

// Update the score display
function updateScore() {
    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();

}

// Update the round display
function updateRound() {
    document.getElementById('round').textContent = round;
}

// Move to the next round
function nextRound() {
    round++;
    updateRound();
    targetScore *= 2;
    pieces = [];
    spawnPiece();
}

// End the game
function endGame() {
    gameOver = true;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);
    gameOverSound.play();
    document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.remove('hidden');
}

// Restart the game
document.getElementById('restart-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.getElementById('game-over').classList.add('hidden');
    init();
});

// Start the game
init();
</code_agent_write_file>
